# Fairyland Logger for Python

A lightweight and flexible logging library for Python applications, designed to simplify logging setup and management.

## Features
- Easy to configure and use
- Supports multiple log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL)
- Customizable log formats
- File and console logging
- Thread-safe logging
